message.content:
<<<api>>>: getResources().getStringArray
<<<code>>>: String[] countries = getResources().getStringArray(R.array.countries_array);
ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> arrayList = new ArrayList<>();
for (String country : countries) {
    String[] countryDetails = country.split(",");
    ArrayList<String> countryList = new ArrayList<>();
    countryList.add(countryDetails[0]);
    countryList.add(countryDetails[1]);
    arrayList.add(countryList);
}
<<<explanation>>>: Use getResources().getStringArray to retrieve the array from the XML resource. Then, iterate through the array and split each element by the desired delimiter (in this case, ","). Create an ArrayList to store each country's details, and add them to the main ArrayList.
